name: Moritz The Striker CPC
description:
Moritz The Striker CPC

Moritz has arrived at Anfield, the home of his beloved Liverpool Football Club to answer the call of Jurgen Klopp.

He must use all of his football skills, trick shots and agility to score in each of the levels to progress.   First he must retrieve the ball, dodge the card hungry marauding refs, pitch invaders and other assorted characters, knock over a flag and get it in the back of the net. On some of the levels the ball has been locked in a cage and a plunger or switch must first be pressed to release the ball.

The final level sees Moritz trying to score at the Kop end to complete his dream of joining LFC.  Watch out, more than 8 yellow cards and Moritz will see red, he'll be off and his dream over.

NB: To shoot press left/right and shoot together!

W    hen Moritz is celebrating press up to start the next level.

Game On !

Physical copy can be bought here:

https://www.sintech-shop.de/moritz-the-striker/a-10760
